Frequently Asked Questions

What services do you offer?

My services land in to 4 primary categories:

  1. Promotion - a combined set of marketing materials to help you reach your audience.
  2. New Business - business assets such as new websites, eCommerce stores, logos, business cards, etc to help you get off the ground running.
  3. eCommerce / Redesign - If you need a website that does it all: completely custom, ability to edit everything and training videos to get you going, then you've come to the right place.
  4. Hire me / Retainers - Need extra help or a custom build? I offer Design, Web, Store maintenance, eCommerce, Photography, Logo design, a Time Machine. I can deliver. Available early AM, late PM. I speak Line, color, texture, contrast, alignment, shape, size, value, space, repetition, proximity, eCommerce, WordPress, X, Cornerstone, Drupal, Magento, Joomla, UX, HTML5, CSS3, LESS, SASS, PHP, MySQL, JS, JQUERY,Git
What does 8 hours with a retainer get me?

Here's an example of what I can do in 8 hours.

Who do you prefer to work with?

I love working with most businesses. Micro and major alike. I've worked for major companies like Zaxby's, A.B. Tech, Girls on the Run, King Bio, New Human and OM Sanctuary. I've also have worked with amazing startups such as Mobile Tech, Shmoo Media, Lil Bit's Event Planning, Human Bookkeeping, and Fill My Cup Cafe.

I appreciate most industries and have a ton of work dealing with holistic and natural companies. Cafes and restaurants will definitely benefit from my monthly promotions.

What is your specialty?

You can find many designers and developers online that can do a lot of one thing. My client base typically benefits from my extreme expertise in making print and web marketing materials completely cohesive and custom.

Try out a Start Right Promo to see what I mean. :)

Do you offer printing services?

Absolutely. Just pick what you need here, and email any FINAL assets matching design specs to will@startrighttoday.com

Why does it make sense to purchase a promotion vs individual products?

The best way to save with Start Right and get best ROI is batching specific deliverable designs. If you're running a promotion on say, "Cheese Cake," if you order flyers, banners and posters separate, you'll end up paying for a design fee for each deliverable.

With Start Right Promo, you pay for a primary or primary and secondary design fee and all of this carries down to all of your deliverables. Ultimately saving you a ton of money.

Do Start Right Websites Scale Well?

What is scalability?

Scalability is the ability to grow without it negatively affecting the store’s performance.

Start Right websites use modern coding conventions paired with the strongest eCommerce solution available. You'll be able to handle thousands transactions with your Start Right Website.
